#include <string>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int T=0;
    string a,b;
    
    cin >> T;
    
    while(T--)
    {
      a=b="";
      
      cin >> a >> b;
 
      sort(a.begin(),a.end());
      sort(b.begin(),b.end());
      
      if(a == b)
       cout << "YES\n";
      else
       cout << "NO\n";
       }
       
       return 0;
       //system("pause");
       }
